Posts.Content: Just had my consultation today. PSA, six months ago was 8 last week 11... Dr. did DRE last week, biopsy last Friday and result today was... Gleason 1 = 3, Gleason 2 =3 (6) Scheduling CT with trace next Tuesday and Bone density probably on thursday... I have no idea about options at this time and I have no clue about what's next... This is my first medical problem ever... Bob.
Posts.Title: New guy...
